about.title: Engineering the Future of Aviation
about.description: Founded in 2014 by undergraduate students, ITUNOM Unmanned Aerial Vehicles Team draws its strength from Istanbul Technical University's deep-rooted engineering culture. At the center of our mission lies more than just producing unmanned aerial vehicles; we are dedicated to raising qualified, visionary, and productive engineers in line with Turkey's strategic scientific and technological development goals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: We proudly represent our country in the most prestigious national and international competitions by developing autonomous systems and innovative software solutions.

workspace.title: Our Mission
workspace.text: Our team functions as an interdisciplinary R&D laboratory, transforming theoretical knowledge into field-tested practical experience.

cta.title: Join Our Team
cta.description: Shape the future of aviation technologies with ITUNOM. Work on autonomous systems, artificial intelligence, and drone technologies.

gallery.title: GALLERY
gallery.description: You can access our team's photos and videos via the buttons below. You can request our team's media and gallery archive by sending an email to <0>iha@itu.edu.tr</0>.

photo_1.title: SIMSEK UAV Test Flight
photo_1.desc: Test flight of Simsek UAV developed for SUAS 2024 competition. Autonomous mission capabilities were successfully tested.

photo_2.title: SUAS 2023 Championship
photo_2.desc: Our championship trophy and team photo at the SUAS 2023 competition held in the USA.

photo_3.title: Teknofest 2024 Ranking
photo_3.desc: We are proud to have achieved 3rd place in the Teknofest Unmanned Aerial Vehicles competition.

photo_4.title: Workshop Activities
photo_4.desc: UAV production and assembly work of our team members in the ITU workshop.

photo_5.title: Autonomous Mission Test
photo_5.desc: Field test of Simsek UAV's autonomous navigation and target detection systems.

photo_6.title: Introductory Meeting
photo_6.desc: Shots from our new term introductory meeting. We came together with our new friends who joined us.

photo_7.title: DISSIZ Combat UAV
photo_7.desc: Dissiz project developed for the Teknofest 2024 Combat UAV category.

photo_8.title: TOSUN UAV Launch
photo_8.desc: Introduction and first flight moments of TOSUN UAV developed for SUAS 2022.

photo_9.title: Meeting with Sponsors
photo_9.desc: Meeting held with our sponsors who support our projects.

video_1.desc: Our journey to the championship at the SUAS 2023 competition held in America.

team.title: OUR TEAM
team.description: ITUNOM is a team where talented students from different engineering disciplines come together to develop world-class UAV systems.

join.title: Want to Join Our Team?
join.description: If you are an ITU student and interested in aviation technologies, you can join us. We recruit new members every semester.

achievements.title: OUR ACHIEVEMENTS
achievements.description: The achievements we have obtained in national and international competitions are a reflection of our team's dedication and hard work.

highlight1.title: SUAS 2023
highlight1.subtitle: Championship
highlight1.description: Winning the championship at the SUAS 2023 competition held in the USA demonstrated our team's strength on the international stage.

highlight2.title: Teknofest 2019
highlight2.subtitle: First Place
highlight2.description: Our first place victory at Teknofest, Turkey's largest technology festival, proved that we are pioneers on the national level.

autonomous.description: Fully autonomous flight and mission capabilities using artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms.

reliability.description: High reliability achieved through multiple failsafe systems and rigorous testing processes.

sponsors.title: OUR SPONSORS
sponsors.description: We thank our valuable sponsors who support our projects and are part of the ITUNOM family.

become.title: Want to Become a Sponsor?
become.description: By collaborating with ITUNOM, you can contribute to the future of Aviation and UAV technologies. Contact us to support our team.

visibility.text: Your brand visibility will increase in competitions, media, and social platforms.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: You can use the contact information below to get in touch with us, join our team, or become a sponsor.

q1.question: How can I join the team?
q1.answer: If you are an ITU student, you can apply for membership recruitments held at the beginning of each semester. For detailed information, send an email to iha@itu.edu.tr.

q2.question: Which departments can students join from?
q2.answer: Students from Aeronautical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical-Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and all engineering departments can join.

q3.question: What should I do to become a sponsor?
q3.answer: For sponsorship opportunities, you can send an email with the subject 'Sponsorship Request' to iha@itu.edu.tr. We will forward our sponsorship packages to you.

contact.note: NOTE: Update this section with your actual contact information

joinUs.title: JOIN US
joinUs.subtitle: Let's build the future of aviation technologies together. Be a part of the ITUNOM family.

software.title: Software Team
software.desc: Autonomous flight algorithms, image processing, ground control station, and embedded software development.

mechanical.title: Mechanical Team
mechanical.desc: Aerodynamic design, structural analysis, manufacturing, and assembly processes.

promotion.title: Promotion & Sponsorship Team
promotion.desc: Managing team promotion, sponsorship acquisition, and public relations.

avionics.title: Avionics Team
avionics.desc: Electronic circuit design, sensor integration, and power distribution systems.

process.title: Application Process
process.description: We recruit new members at the beginning of each semester. After applications are evaluated, the interview process begins.
